report

Class SnapshotReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.Report
      • report.SnapshotReport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnergyLevelReport, LocationSnapshotReport

    public abstract class SnapshotReport
extends Report
implements UpdateListener
    Node snapshot report superclass. Reports some characteristic of all (or only some, see REPORTED_NODES) nodes every configurable-amount-of seconds (see GRANULARITY).

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String REPORTED_NODES

      protected java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> reportedNodes
      Networks addresses (integers) of the nodes which are reported

    • Field Detail

      • GRANULARITY

        public static final java.lang.String GRANULARITY
        Reporting granularity -setting id ("granularity"). Defines the interval how often (seconds) a new snapshot is created
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REPORTED_NODES

        public static final java.lang.String REPORTED_NODES
        Optional reported nodes (comma separated list of network addresses). By default all nodes are reported.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
